professional_summary: Diligent SQL Server Reporting developer, business analyst, website developer, database administrator with over seven years of experience in related fields. Proficient in developing SQL Server reports, specializing in website design templates and database connection implementation. Seeking to apply development and database management skills while continuing learning.

key_responsibilities: Developing and optimizing SQL Server reports
Analyzing business requirements and data needs
Collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver solutions
Designing and developing websites and web applications
Ensuring compliance with technical specifications and business requirements
Managing and optimizing databases to support organizational needs
Providing technical support for database queries and issues
Developing websites and web applications as assigned by project managers
Testing projects to meet business requirements and technical specifications
Collaborating with clients to understand their website development needs
